website_summaries.verdict: A deluxe kit that's durable and comes with many features.
pros: Holds 2 batteries and can last a long time
Digital timer allows for 6 feeding times
Unit can work reliably over several years
A great replacement unit for older systems
Versatile enough to be used on a bucket or a larger drum
cons: This product only provides the spreader
You need to provide your own drum for holding feed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: FOR THOSE THAT HAVE BEEN PURCHASING THE MOULTRIE PRO MAGNUM DEER FEEDERS, I BOUGHT 5 OF THESE FEEDERS AND WHEN CONNECTING BATTERIES TO OPERATE, THREE DID NOT WORK. NO DIGITAL NUMBERS SHOWED UP ON TWO AND ONE SHOWED 6 BACKWARDS ALL THE WAY ACROSS USING FULLING CHARGED BATTERIES. DO NOT PANIC, REMOVE THE DIGITAL BOARD BY REMOVING THE TWO SCREWS AT THE TOP AND THERE IS A SMALL RESET BUTTON ON THE BACK. LOOKS LIKE I GOT THEM OUT OF SLEEP MODE. ALL THREE CAME BACK AND ARE WORKING FINE. SO FAR PLEASED WITH THEM. HOPE THIS HELPS. THKS
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than a year, But
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a year ago 2017 band went to refill my feeder this year 2018 and found that 25% of the feed had not been dispensed. I filled the feeder because it was a haul to get to it. I saw that the digital read out was off. I took the two batteries out and tried a new one and it did not come on. I got home ( 3 hour drive) and tested the batteries and they were fine. Both were 6 Volts. after reading on line there is a reset button on the back I will try that next. Hopefully that will solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Flood

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 8 mo ago, so I would have it for deer season this year. Worked for 3 weeks, now have to send back and wait on another one (and a $35.00 charge) as deer season is now starting. This is ruining my opening day, so thanks a lot Moultrie, for nothing. Customer service does not care about customers in a pinch. It worked 3 weeks, and warranty is 35 bucks,even for 3 weeks of service.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would be smart and removed the plate with the holes in it
customer_reviews.text: This feeder spinner can not be beat. I have owned several others, and this thing is all metal, way tougher, and reliable. I bought a second one as soon as I received the first one. The only reason I can't give it 5 stars, is the instruction say to drill holes using the included template. I never could locate any template. I thought I would be smart and removed the plate with the holes in it, to use as a template...don't do this unless you're ready to reassemble a jigsaw puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Bcompton53

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 of 16 still work
customer_reviews.text: Of the 16 I purchased 4 years ago, only 8 are still working. Their lifetime warranty equates to; pay to ship them to Moultrie and pay an additional 1/3 the price of the unit to Moultrie as their BS "shipping and handling" fee. Customer service department too ignorant to look up the definition of "service" as they have no idea of it's meaning. If your looking for long term service, dependability, etc., purchase other than Moultrie!!
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Big, Heavy, Sturdy. Two thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Had a bunch of similar feeders by Moultrie over the years, but none of them were built like this one. I like that it works either 6V or 12V and with two batteries throws corn a long way. It is also very large, so hard for varmints to get to the corn. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Parker

customer_reviews.title: The all metal casing is great. Easy to program and install
customer_reviews.text: I have had six of these running for the last 7 years. The all metal casing is great. Easy to program and install. I have had one in the past that got water in it from a lid that was blown off that ruined the unit. Previously I had been buying SpinCast anywhere from $150 starting out to now around $225.00. They were good at first and then started having issues with them. Went to Moultree Pro Magnum and can put three of the Moultree's in for the price of one SpinCast (or any other quality feeder). Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Ben fry

customer_reviews.title: Limited life
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the single battery units that lasted for nearly four years with this 2 battery unit. The feed collects on the plate and moisture/dust/whatever causes the motor to seize, rendering the feeder useless. I got less than a year of use out of one unit and slightly more on the other two. Moultrie did not meet expectations at all with this product and would recommend avoiding this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss on working.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it seems great. The first one I bought would not power on with new batteries. Once I installed the second one I thought everything was fine until I checked my feeder 20 days later and it was still full. I ran test cycles after the setup but something must have happened because all of the food was still there. Power display on and full charge on batteries. I’ll check it again in a few days and see.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Much better design and 2 batteries is plus
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is replacing an old model that served me well for 7 years, until the electric motor stop working. Just put this one in service 2 weeks ago. Much better design and 2 batteries is plus. Only time will tell. Would purchase again.Was going to purchase another.Why did it double in price in a year and a few months ?
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kershner

customer_reviews.title: All metal/chew proof.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 8 months (replaced orig. Plastic one). Great battery life (2) 6 volt lantern batteries. No signs of damage from squirrels and GD raccoons! Not a single nibble...lol The plastic one would be GONE by now.
customer_reviews.author: snooty Jim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great, settings I think are more true to spinning weight then the smaller ones. Little weird drilling holes to in drum to match spinner. Made a template wish it came with one
customer_reviews.author: Mons

customer_reviews.title: 2of 3 did not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these. Two did not spin at all. Tried three different batteries. I’ve had trouble with the other Moultrie feeders lately, too. Just got a Moultrie 55 gal with the Pro Magnum motor and it doesn’t work either. There are serious quality control issues at Moultrie it seems. I’ve used their stuff for years, but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feeder jams easily even with clean corn
customer_reviews.text: The feeder is sturdy and easy to program. The problem is that the feed plate that spins is located too close to the end of the feeder funnel, so the plate jams. This has happened repeatedly with the two feeders that I bought eventhough I am using clean corn in the feeders. There is no adjustment on the height of the plate, so I trimmed about a quarter inch off the end of the funnel with a saws all and that seems to have fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dewey

customer_reviews.title: These are just great, and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are just great, and worth the money. Stick one on the bottom of a 55 gallon drum: it's easy, hang a 55 gallon drum full of corn; not so easy. Set the timer for about 10 seconds around dark and forget it for a few months. Two 6 volts last at least a year. Really slings the feed in all directions. I have 2 of these running and they have performed flawlessly. It comes with a template for the holes to mount perfectly to the bottom of a container. Metal housing, quiet, strong, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: On my "third" timer in less than a year. Very unreliable. Very disappointed. I can count on game being more reliable than this product. Very discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: William West

customer_reviews.title: moultrie has bad customer service!! i am an electrical engineer  and  the  person that i spoke with at moultrie ................
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the feed assembly at first, then i noticed the timer wouldnt hold the current date or would not let me do a test feed.after calling moultrie multiple times ,i was told i could send the feeder back , but there was a 35.00’$ charge !!!! i ultimatly bought another timer mechanism for 12.00$ and now the feeder works great !!! and by the way i didnt buy the new timer from moultrie nor will i ever buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hands down the worst feeder on the market, obviously they have an electrical issue with these units, purchased one of these and it worked for about two weeks every time I would go out and check it the feeder would be full, but I really wanted a hanging unit for this specific location figured I just had a bum one, so went and purchased another replaced the crap one and this one worked for about four months and now this one will not even light up with brand new batteries in it!! So please do NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Jasick

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great, Have one of these in the field for 5 years and still going. Even survived a tree falling on unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Feeder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exceeded my expectations. I am extremely happy with the Moultrie Pro Magnum feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fox

customer_reviews.title: plastic bolt holds metal cap.
customer_reviews.text: it is built out of metal and sturdy, but the bolt that holds the metal cover is isnattached to a plastic part. It will not take any impact. if it is struck on the cover it breaks. poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept. Low profile, varmint proof, use one or two batteries. The electronics are terrible and don't last like the should have. About half of the ones I have purchased have stopped putting out corn even though the digital indicates they should.I am very dissatisfied with that!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best deer feeder on the market
customer_reviews.text: two batteries, digital readout, years of life in the elements. what more could you want
customer_reviews.author: Ashleah Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Moultrie service
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this and somehow misplaced the nuts/bolts to attach this to my feeder. I emailed Pradco asking the size of the parts i misplaced. Instead, they shipped me replacement parts. Up and running fine now.
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very nice timer, well thought out, easy to use and gentle on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Emery

customer_reviews.title: I'm writing this a one star because I got the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this a one star because I got the product went to my deer lease installed it and I cannot get it to work it will not come on and we've tried for brand new different batteries so if somebody knows how to get in contact with the manufacturer cuz I can't find it on my phone to get the product replace I would appreciate it thanks
customer_reviews.author: Brian breaux

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one year
customer_reviews.text: Bought September of 2017, used till about late October, stored inside till October of this year, electronic connections are so corroded it will not power up..
customer_reviews.author: Sore Feet

customer_reviews.title: Stick to the older models
customer_reviews.text: The electronics of this feeder are far less durable than the older moultrie feeders. I had 2 of these fail after a single season with no visible failure mode, the screens won’t light up at all. My older ones are 5 seasons in and still running great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R. Kaunisto

customer_reviews.title: Great product great service
customer_reviews.text: Great motor at a great price with great service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: George Yates

customer_reviews.title: Best feeder I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best feeder I've ever owned. Using two batteries. Feeder and barrel cranked up on 20 ft. steel pole and a bear has already climbed up and slapped the feeder. Straightened fins feeder working like new. After two months use batteries are still fully charged. Next feeder will be a Pro-mag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last one year
customer_reviews.text: Mine crapped out on me the first year I had it and was unreliable. I had two high quality batteries in it and it wouldn’t work half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feeder. I have three of these and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent feeder. I have three of these and they have worked flawlessly. With the two battery system I can use for at least 6 months without change.I use a 30 gallon galvanized trash barrel and easily attatch .
customer_reviews.author: cowboy

customer_reviews.title: simple the best
customer_reviews.text: best feeder motor on the market. No cheap plastic all metal. critter guard, and 2 batteries can be used which doubles runtime. really throws the corn to increase feeding area
customer_reviews.author: g man

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this feeder before, so decided to buy another one. They are a little more expensive but worth the money. I have had coons try, try, try their hardest to break this feeder. It has stood up the test of time and varments.
customer_reviews.author: Garrick Hape

customer_reviews.title: Well built and made to last
customer_reviews.text: Great spinner for my deer feeder. Metal frame and guard keeps the coins out. Timer is reliable and hasn’t given any issues at all. Love it. Is my go to spinner with the great price and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. But

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...frame made to last
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way these timers are made. All aluminum housing should last much longer than my old plastic ones. As long as everything else holds up I will be very satisfied. I have actually bought 4 of these to put on feeders I have been building.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: I have several of these, feeders but we have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these,feeders but we have large black bears here in eastern North Carolina that can be very distructive at times. I have most of them out of their reach but they got one so,we replaced with this.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Russ

customer_reviews.title: Missing template
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and the feeders are great but both boxes were missing the installation templates.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder motor
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, by far the best feeder system I have used. It is well protected from varmints and strong enough for bears pawing at it not to damage it. It also has space for two 6 volt batteries runs for a really long time. I love the feed calculator tell it how much corn you put in and based on the run time you select it tells you how many days of feeding you have left. The only negative I can see is that it does not have sped control settings for the motor like some other units. So it shoots the corn pretty far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these. Very easy to program. All metal design. The timer tells me how long my corn will last which is an awesome feature. Its six hours to my lease, so the two batteries make it nice.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: RACCOON PROOF
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. Mounted mine to a 55 gallon drum works great! Easy to program has 6 time settings, but best of all its raccoon proof. Got some hilarious trail cam photos of them trying
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Try it out before installing on the feeder.
customer_reviews.text: I liked because it was easy to install. It was my 2nd one I bought. The first one, the motor rusted, didn’t work. The new one one does not show all the digits on the display. Hunting season started so I couldn’t send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Arnulfo C.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Feeder is a beast. The battery life lasts forever. If you use two batteries, I was at almost 100% after a full year of use. Feeder doesn’t jam and goes off when it’s supposed to. Can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Moultries quick response to problems I was experiencing
customer_reviews.text: My 2 new pro mag. feeders are both up and feeding dependable.I had some problems in the beginning , but Moultrie backed their warranty and made sure I was a satisfied customer. This feeder is built heavy duty , slings the corn further than any I"ve ever used.I also like that it has compartments for two 6 volt batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel K.

customer_reviews.title: Best spinner available
customer_reviews.text: These are the best spinners I’ve ever used. Dual batteries. Haven’t had to change them in over two years.
customer_reviews.author: chris hunt

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good design
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far. seems like a good design. I like the ability to be able to select 6 different timed releases.
customer_reviews.author: PaJack

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel proof!
customer_reviews.text: Super durable, add a single 6v and wildgame solar panel and you're set!
customer_reviews.author: diddydc

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 2 years ago and it's preformed flawlessly. 2 battery design is great, easy to program, holds up to the weather. No problems with jamming if corn is relatively clean. Would buy again if needing a new feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: so far very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased two of these in August 2017, the addition of the squirrel guard really helps... These seem well-built and capable of getting many years of service out of them, so far very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Blayde Stone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still working great after a month. Thrower could line up with guards better.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Bear proof feeder.
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 55 gallon bear proof feeder. Installed a month ago and so far it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Harding

customer_reviews.title: Holds water.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great feeder if it doesnt rain where you are. This is my 4th one of this brand that has ended up soaking wet and fried.
customer_reviews.author: ThrashinCrashin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It has worked for a month now it doesn't feed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Surber

customer_reviews.title: Design pervents varmits  damage to feeder
customer_reviews.text: Used as a replacement for a feeder that was damaged by squirrels and the design of this feeder has prevented the same damage.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feeder
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and program. Only feeder i know that stops coons and squirrels instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: EASY to install. We replaced units from existing tub feeders. Works so much better, made with metal instead of plastic and keeps critters away much better.
customer_reviews.author: Davis D

customer_reviews.title: This feeder motor is AWESOME! All metal no plastic for animals to chew ...
customer_reviews.text: This feeder motor is AWESOME! All metal no plastic for animals to chew on AND has a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Took care of the raccoons tearing up the feeders. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... SOME OF EVERY BRAND THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST I HAVE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SOME OF EVERY BRAND THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST I HAVE EVER HAD. WOULD BUY IT AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: wayne nichols

customer_reviews.title: Good dependable feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit that I have bought. First one I have had a little over a year. Good dependable feeder, easy to program. I mount them on a 55 gallon drum.
customer_reviews.author: DABitfire

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Good feeder overall. No template included which makes install tougher. Also wing nuts hard to install thru carnitas guard. Easy to program and feeds corn well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these and they work great. I had an issue with the paddle "thrower", and Moultrie service was EXCELLENT. Highly recommend products from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and with 2 batteries lasts longer than the usual. Varmint proof also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product great customer service. Product as described and received on time.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. Very happy with purchase. Best I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Nearly indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Have used a dozen different motors. DO NOT waste your money on anything else. This thing is dang near bulletproof.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Oden

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well and is easy to use. Now I must wait to see how long it holds up but looks like a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FEEDER NO PROBLEMS SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: GOOD FEEDER NO PROBLEMS SO FAR. I HAVE 1 THAT I HAVE TO RETURN TO MOULTRIE AS I CAN NOT PROGRAM IT AND IT WOULD NOT SPIN.I HAD IT FOR APPROX. 5 YEARS AND THEY SUPPOSEDLY HAVE A LIFETIME WARRANTY.OTHERWISE GOOD FEEDER
customer_reviews.author: Allen F.Herman

customer_reviews.title: Received feeder today and it is a used unit  corn residue and dust all over feeder
customer_reviews.text: Product was supposed to be new not used or reconditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Mert

customer_reviews.title: One thing I really like, they sling corn a long ways
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and have been using them for several weeks now. So far they have performed as they should. Check with me this time next year and I'll let you know how well they are doing. One thing I really like, they sling corn a long ways. Much farther than any feeders that I have ever owned before.
customer_reviews.author: sonny hedgecock

customer_reviews.title: This feeder is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This feeder is very sturdy and well made. The spinner is very fast and will spread corn a long ways out.
customer_reviews.author: McSlide

customer_reviews.title: So far excellent feeder motor.
customer_reviews.text: Update after some use but so far best feeder motor I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, easy to install, and packed with all the features you hope to have in a feed kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Watson

customer_reviews.title: doing an excellent job. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Just checked it again yesterday. Been up and running for 3 months now. doing an excellent job. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: All Metal bad holds 2 batteries. Controller is intuitive. Easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: DBCox

customer_reviews.title: Recieved and put on feeder only to find out it ...
customer_reviews.text: Recieved and put on feeder only to find out it would not work so returned! Made in China! Enough said. Will only buy USA
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: Wildlife Feeder
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy/ Great Product/ had it up all summer and no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Explorer

customer_reviews.title: PRO MAGNUM
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other brands with average results at best , I tried the pro magnum and am very pleased . they are easy to setup, use and are built to last . We now own seven .
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hudson

customer_reviews.title: BEST PROGRAMABLE FEEDER
customer_reviews.text: POWERFUL MOTOR REALLY THROWS THE CORN THE DUAL BATT. KEEPS THE FEEDER RUNNING IN BITTER COLD KEEP IT OUT OF BEARS REACH.
customer_reviews.author: AFRICA AL

customer_reviews.title: Timer did not work. I have to remove off ...
customer_reviews.text: Timer did not work. I have to remove off feeder and send back. I drive 300 miles to hunt. My advice is to check timer before you install.
customer_reviews.author: william alexander

customer_reviews.title: I have always used moultrie feeders without any problems. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always used moultrie feeders without any problems. This model has the days remaining feature for feed that I was not sure about because of varmits, but it has impressed me on how close it is.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, very easy to make your own feeders with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Perleberg

customer_reviews.title: Moultrie Pro Magnum
customer_reviews.text: Item offered at a great price and shipped quickly. I hope to use it very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece of equipment. Have it installed and it is working nicely.
customer_reviews.author: BLN

customer_reviews.title: was much better when made in USA Alabaster
customer_reviews.text: bought 4 of these, returned 2, they all mess up, was much better when made in USA Alabaster, Al.
customer_reviews.author: Labrador

customer_reviews.title: i have two pro magnum feeders,also the 30gal. easy fill feeder
customer_reviews.text: Pro magnum kit, installed moultrie rechargable battery and set time ,works perfect, also added remote control, and went by instructions see it work perfect as well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kevin engel

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait season to open
customer_reviews.text: Looks well built. Easy to program. Critter gaurd should really help . Will be a lot better than having to carry a bucket full at a time out to my feed pile.
customer_reviews.author: James J Konarski II

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: great product, has worked flawlessly for the past 4 weeks, love the smart feature of days left in corn. great
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Have'nt used it long enough yet all the other Moultrie ...
customer_reviews.text: Have'nt used it long enough yet all the other Moultrie feeder motors I have purchased have not lasted very long at all. Bought green one with the control panel on the side last year I have now been through three control panels 1 of them didn't even make it to the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B.

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted, easy to program, and works great and the price was very reasonable. I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: ryda

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great feeder all steel construction. Bought it to replace a plastic model which the squirrels chewed up. The feeder can take up to two batteries and throws corn much further than my previous American Hunter model. Mine actually mounted in the same holes. I did throw away the leaf spring washers as one wouldn't allow the feeder to mount flat.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first because the birds were unable to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had three and all three have done the same thing. The spinning plate gets stuck and won’t work anywhere between couple months and 6 months. Liked it at first because the birds were unable to get to it and the corn lasted a long time. If I turn the spinner it will work for next day or two ten gets stuck again. I used to buy a lot of different thing from moultrie, like game cameras which I will not buy anymore and now I will be buying different feeders. Bushnel game cams are the way to go too.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Best feeder motor on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a bunch of different feeder motors and timers. This one is the best by far. Two batteries last nearly a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jay K.

customer_reviews.title: they have beefed up the varmint guard and it is easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, they have beefed up the varmint guard and it is easy to program. Only thing it lacks is a test spin cycle to see if it is working. Have to set a time one or two minutes ahead of timer on feeder to make sure it is working. I have a number of these feeders four years old and they have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Canan

customer_reviews.title: Big item needed two batteries make work as should with ...
customer_reviews.text: Big item needed two batteries make work as should with only one battery feed cycle slow and weak true test is how many seasons will work only has 2 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Deserves zero stars
customer_reviews.text: At first even when connected to two new batteries the unit would not power on. Once the display was reset and repositioned inside the unit it finally powered up. Then i found the motor to be defective. Don't waste your time or money on this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: jay

product_meta.title: Moultrie Pro Magnum Deer Feeder Kit | All Metal Housing | Built-in Varmint Guard | Battery Indicator
product_meta.description: Moultrie’s most deluxe feeder kit, this robust all-metal model features a built-in varmint guard and an easy-to-program timer with a large LCD screen that saves time and eliminates frustration. Customize feed amounts with variable settings from 1 to 20 seconds, and enjoy the power of a large industrial-grade motor and the protection of a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Digital timer programs up to 6 feed times a day, 1 to 20 seconds each
All-metal housing with diamond-shaped spin plate, built-in varmint guard and funnel
Built-in feed-level estimator, battery indicator, external power port and solar panel connectors (solar panel sold separately)
One (1) 6-volt battery required, two (2) for extended field life
Easy-to-program timer with large LCD screen saves time and eliminates frustration
All metal, diamond shaped spinner plate protects against varmints
All hardware is included that is needed to complete your feeder

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
